title: THIS IS RIDICULOUS
body: I'M SICK AND TIRED OF MY CLIENT NOT OPENING AND GAMES GETTING REMADE EVERY TIME I TRY AND PLAY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! AND ON TOP OF THAT, I KEEP GETTING LOW PRIORITY QUEUE FROM LEAVER BUSTER WHEN I'M NOT EVEN LEAVING GAMES OR DOING ANYTHING LIKE THAT@!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! RIOT STOP GIVING ME LOW PRIORITY AND FIX THE CLIENT PLEASE! I HAVE ALSO PATCHED MY GAME MULTIPLE TIMES! SOMEONE HELP PLEASE. Every time this happens I try and restart my client but it takes too long to re-open and games are remade by then.

replies.body: I'd like to help you with whatever is causing you to leave games, but there's no information here on the issue.  Can you provide some more details on what exactly is happening?  Let me know!
Have you tried uninstalling league and then re-installing it?? That will get rid of any corrupted files. If it doesnt work then you can contact riot support on twitter, or submit a ticket to riot.
